//Store details for recycler view Marini’s on 57 Troika Sky Dining Thirty8 Enak KL Nobu Kuala Lumpur Marble 8 on 56 El Toro Loco KL Positano Risto Canopy Rooftop Bar and Lounge Qureshi Malaysia Hair Secret A-SALOON+ Sunway Putra Mall Ben\'s Independent Grocer, Publika Village Grocer (Bangsar Village) Typo (KLCC) CzipLee Bangsar Urban Edge Home Gallery Levain Boulangerie & Patisserie
An exclusive Italian ristorante on the 57th floor of PETRONAS Tower 3 (adjacent to Suria KLCC), Marini’s on 57 is a fine dining Kuala Lumpur restaurant offering gorgeous, up-close views of the iconic PETRONAS Twin Towers through its floor-to-ceiling windows and glass roof. Comprising a restaurant, bar and lounge, its décor is elegant and restrained, and the kitchen offers a menu of haute Italian cuisine, with standout dishes such as spaghetti with botargo (mullet roe) and almonds. Popular with young, trendy urbanites, from the outside The Troika blends in with the rest of the city’s industrial skyline, looking like just any other concrete, steel and glass structure. However, inside each of the building’s dining and drinking venues is an entirely different experience with low-key yet stylish design schemes that allow the views to take centre stage. An unbeatable dining room, wine bar and lounge on the 38th floor of Kuala Lumpur’s Grand Hyatt Hotel, Thirty8 KL is a market focused temptation to local and visiting gourmet enthusiasts. Offering a diverse menu of Chinese and Thai seafood, Japanese sushi and sashimi and steaks, the elegant eatery is clearly one of the city’s best restaurants. Everything on the menu is excellent but we are fans of the flawless symphony of fresh sushi and sashimi. Upscale yet inviting, polished yet unpretentious, large wraparound windows offer spectacular views of the prominent PETRONAS Twin Towers. Enak KL is one of the city’s most famous high-end Malay restaurants. It is a pork-free restaurant set in the classy Starhill Gallery Mall that specialises in spicy Malay food. One of the Malaysian Tatler’s 2011 ‘Best Restaurants’, it was established in 2001 and serves an international clientele. Nobu Kuala Lumpur is a Michelin-starred titan in the world of sushi, sashimi and tempura. The world famous restaurant, co-owned by American actor Robert De Niro, first started out in 1994 in New York. It went on to win critical acclaim for its glorious dishes that were classically comforting yet creative, and chef Nobu Matsuhisa and his partners went on take the world by storm, opening more than 29 franchises over the globe. Envisaged as the pinnacle of steakhouse dining with its own signature Marble 8 Cuts, this part of the journey will redefine your understanding and appreciation of dry-aged beef, all against the backdrop of Kuala Lumpur’s most desirable skyline, that of the majestic Twin Towers soaring into the sky. You are most welcome to view the Steakhouse Menu Here. Before you conclude your evening’s magical journey, indulge in the finest selection of whiskey and cigars amidst the trappings of old world charms in our privé. There are no limits or restrictions as to what defines a good tapa, which is why we at El Toro Loco present you with a combination of old school classical as well as creative modern tapas. Positano Risto was created to give diners all over the world the choice for an amazing alcohol free Italian dining experience. We strive to provide delicious food using only halal ingredients at great value with a unique ambience and fantastic service while being able to do good for the community as well. Canopylounge by Tigerbay is the ultimate shisha smoking experience in Kuala Lumpur with our exclusive cocktails and premium range of shisha tobacco from around the globe. Come and Relax in our Shisha Terrace / Rooftop Restaurant or kick back in style in our VIP lounge and let our friendly staff do the rest. Enjoy fresh food & desserts from our delicious menu, all designed with a twist on the traditional indo-chinese cuisine and to be enjoyed on our spectacular rooftop terrace overlooking the magnificent Petronas towers. We have the perfect setting to come and relax with friends and watch live sports or to enjoy one of many of our live events including belly dancers and snake charmers. Come and visit us today! The distinction of making Indian Heritage cuisine world famous undoubtedly belongs to Grand Master Chef Imtiaz Qureshi. He was responsible for introducing the concept of the \'Stand-up Tandoor\' and \'Dum\' by researching and perfecting them as Chef, at the various restaurants. Chef Imtiaz created recipes that are now on the menus of numerous Indian restaurants world over. Qureshi’s name has been synonymous with good eating for over 200 years that they have been in operation. At Hair Secret, our staff of highly trained, professional hairstylists helps you find the look that is right for your personality and lifestyle. Since 2009, A-Saloon has been revolutionizing your hair care experience which is why we are recognized as Malaysia’s National Largest Chains of Salons. With more than 20 salons available, we aim to provide you with a 6-star service and experience. Step into any A-Saloon and you will see that it is created with the client in mind. Not only is it luxurious and comfortable, our outlets are also equipped with a private area for our Muslim clients. Every client is given professional advice and personalized home care by our professional stylists, according to the client’s needs. Ben’s Independent Grocer (B.I.G.) was established with one idea in mind, to be a one-stop EAT. DRINK. SHOP. avenue for people who love food as much as we do! Experience a complete grocery adventure through our impressive array of specialised ingredient themed sections like Barn Butchery, Bay Seafood, B.Organic and Malaya Kitchen (just to name a few). But wait! B.I.G. offers more than your everyday essentials and consumables! We also aim to satiate your appetite for discovery through live demonstrations, community driven events at our Little Big Market, and many other fun creative activities! Sections are well-organised, staff are friendly and well-trained, pricing is reasonable and most importantly, entire place is kept clean all the time. There\'s a wide range of produce regardless whether fresh or frozen. We\'ve got plenty more where that came from. Check out LITERALLY everything we\'ve got! Homewares to vibe check your space, stationery and desk accessories to fuel your organisation, tech gear to keep you pro-tech-ted and so much more. A few of our favourite things? Well since you asked so nicely . . . Socks, Mugs, Lighting, Laptop & Phone Cases, Drink Bottles, Candles, Pens, Diaries . . . the list goes on! CzipLee Plus is CzipLee\'s concept store that pushes the envelope with fine paper goods and writing instruments. Find a range of notebooks, planners and sketchbooks to pen down ideas by renowned notebook makers.Explore the variety of classic pens for the ultimate writing experience. We handpick products for you that are more than just aesthetics but with lasting functionality for years to come. We\'re a family that\'s passionate about stationery. Once in a while we find an exceptional pencil, a well crafted pen, or a quirky notebook. "There is pride in craftsmanship, especially when beautiful objects are created from inception through build." Discover our captivating collection of curated Southeast Asian designer pieces, crafted for life. Experience new perspectives for your space. Welcome to Urban Edge.. In the quiet streets off Jalan Imbi, where colonial-style bungalows dot the landscape, you will find Levain Boulangerie & Patisserie, a warm and lovely French-style bakery and café where you can savour soft, warm and superbly fresh breads and pastries while enjoying a cup of coffee.At Levain, breads and pastries are baked all day using natural yeast, in a traditional stone oven which imparts a unique flavour and texture to the breads and pastries.
Collection of bottles that include single cask whiskies from independent bottlers and special-edition scotches from big distilleries Three-course meal here with truffled poached egg (RM50) with savoury barley c ream, Swiss chard, egg yolk foam, beef fat vinaigrette, crisp dried beef and truffle batonnet RM150 for thick, 200g cut of tenderloin and RM130 for a barbecue Australian Black Angus bone-in short rib. Enak KL’s specialty desserts – the manisan kelapa muda enak (young coconut in rich, velvety custard topped with meringue) is the best way to indulge. Chilean sea bass (RM150) marinated with red jalapeño miso – at once smoky, salty and sweet in flavour – will certainly be the surefire winner of the night’s meal. Lighter options on Marble 8 Steakhouse’s menu includes soy sauce marinated blue-eyed cod, rosemary grilled spring chicken, as well as veal bacon carbonara with fettucine pasta and 32-month aged parmesan. Authentic Spanish tapas, wines and creative cocktails in a cozy streetside setting in the heart of Kuala Lumpur\'s CBD. Price range : MYR 4 - MYR 15 Show us your MySejahtera and get an additional 10% off TOTAL BILL on top of all our current promotions. Let\'s do this together! For those with pure food indulgence in mind, choose from our authentically delicious Indian cuisine, from our mouth-watering dessert menu alongside our expertly made cocktails guaranteed to spice up your evening. Our Kitchen is open till late night! Family Meals price range RM 45 - RM 70 Reasonable price, qualified stylists, professional services plus friendly staff. Wash & Blow (Straight & Forward) – RM45 onwards(female), Wash & Blow – RM25 onwards(male) Get RM4 Cashback with ShopeePay Cashback with ShopeePay Are you a #stationeryaddict? SAME! Welcome to your safe place, the place where you will find the most useful, unique and functional stationery items to add to your collection. We\'ve got the pen\'s, you\'ve got the power. Laser engraving | Customizable Stationery | Notebook Embossing Price Range starts from RM 299 (discounts available for walk-in customers) Price Range starts at RM 5
